sentence.Network_en: He could just about see the little man behind the counter.
sentence.Network_cn: 他勉强能看到柜台后面的小个子男人。

sentence.Network_en: The army now appears to have launched a counter-offensive.
sentence.Network_cn: 军队现在似乎已经发起了反攻。

sentence.Network_en: The shop assistant received me indifferently while leaning on a counter.
sentence.Network_cn: 商店售货员靠在柜台上漫不经心地招呼我。
